snippet.title: FAIRY TAIL: Beach Volleyball Havoc（Magic beach volleyball battle game） Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2116680/ 

FAIRY TAIL: Beach Volleyball Havoc is a no-holds-barred chaotic magic beach volleyball action game 
which can be played alone or with up to 4 people locally or via Steam Remote Play Together. 
Though the controls are easy to learn, these fierce 2-on-2 matches will have you on the edge of your seat!



【Story】
The beach volleyball tournament was held again this year in the Kingdom of Fiore.
When the mages of Ishgar gather together, the beach turns into a scorching heat and is swallowed up in a whirlpool of chaos...

【The crazy beach volleyball tournament using magic is about to begin!】
A two-on-two battle with easy controls and a sweaty hand!
Coordinate well with your partner and hit them with a powerful magic attack!
You can get new characters and illustrations at the end of the game.

【A total of 32 mages will participate in the game!】
Fairy tails, sword-biting tigers, snake princess scales, blue heavenly horses... mages from all over the continent have gathered!
Choose two of the 32 players and form your own beach volleyball team!

【Cast your magic and destroy the beach volleyball!】
A total of 100 types of magic! Send the beach into a whirlpool of chaos and laughter with your flashy magic.

【Up to 4 players can play against each other and Remote Play Together function is supported!】
Up to 4 players can play against each other in a local environment by preparing a controller!
You can also use Steam's Remote Play Together feature to play with a friend online.

【Cautions】
This game is recommended to be played with a controller.
A controller is required when playing with two or more players.
The game can be played against the AI in single player mode, but there is no single player mode available, only the battle mode.
Online play is not possible except with the Steam Remote Play Together function.

－－－－－－－－－－
Title: FAIRY TAIL: Beach Volleyball Havoc
Platform: Steam
Languages: Japanese, English, Chinese (Traditional and Simplified), French, Korean, Thai
Genre: Magic beach volleyball battle game
Planned Launch Date: Tuesday, September 16, 2024
Suggested Retail Price: Unconfirmed
Players: 1-4
Developer: tiny cactus studio, MASUDATARO, veryOK
Publisher: Kodansha
Copyright: ©Hiro Mashima, Kodansha/tiny cactus studio/MASUDATARO/veryOK
